Name: Identification number of the position
Description: All the different observational units (n = 115 + MEHR). Used as connection element.

Name: Snow-disappearing time
Description: Date and time when the snow disappeared from the position. Mostly due to snowmelt in spring. At wind-exposed ridges, due to wind in winter. Date and time determined using soil temperature curves of the loggers: Snow insulation --> constant 0°C.

Name: Snow-in time
Description: Date and time when the position was snowed in in autumn 2019.  Date and time determined using soil temperature curves of the loggers: Snow insulation --> constant 0°C.

Name: Annual minimum soil temperature
Description: Soil minimum temperature along the whole year (09.2019-09.2020) at the respective position, measured 2-3cm below ground using temperature loggers (iButtons).

Name: Annual maximum soil temperature
Description: Soil maximum temperature along the whole year (09.2019-09.2020) at the respective position, measured 2-3cm below ground using temperature loggers (iButtons).
